html:
378 U.S. 579

84 S.Ct. 1909

12 L.Ed.2d 1035

Milton S. MAYER
v.
Dean RUSK, Secretary of State.

No. 746.

Supreme Court of the United States

June 22, 1964

David Carliner, Frank Heisler, Oliver Stone and Jack Wasserman, for appellant.

Solicitor General Cox, for appellee.

PER CURIAM.

1

The judgment is vacated and the case is remanded to the District Court for consideration in light of Aptheker v. Secretary of State, 378 U.S. 500, 84 S.Ct. 1659.

2

Mr. Justice CLARK, Mr., Justice HARLAN and Mr. Justice WHITE would affirm the judgment.
html_lawbox:
378 U.S. 579 (1964)

MAYER
v.
RUSK, SECRETARY OF STATE.

No. 746.

Supreme Court of United States.

Decided June 22, 1964.
APPEAL FROM THE UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT FOR THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA.

David Carliner, Francis Heisler, Oliver Stone and Jack Wasserman for appellant.

Solicitor General Cox for appellee.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is vacated and the case is remanded to the District Court for consideration in light of Aptheker v. Secretary of State, ante, p. 500.

MR. JUSTICE CLARK, MR. JUSTICE HARLAN and MR. JUSTICE WHITE would affirm the judgment.
